name: Wake the Chef!
description:
You play as April Santos, a 16 year old girl fed up with her little brother Jackson's sleeping habits. That kid won't wake up for anything except your sweet and loving yelling! Make your way to your brother while fighting or avoiding enemies.

[Jackson Santos is the four year old world-renown chef who defeated both Gordon Ramsey and Bobby Flay in a cookoff.  At the same time. Three times in a row. Jackson also owns multiple restaurants around the world, all highly renowned and featured in the Michelin Guide. He has earned 3 Michelin stars for many of his restaurants. Because of this, he's a smug little brat. But rightfully so.]

Use W, A, S, D or arrow keys for basic movement.

Use the spacebar to jump.

Use Alt+F4 to quit.

This level was created in two weeks in a Game Design Pre-College program. I hope you enjoy it!
